name: 施陽正
objective: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
schedule:
週次　　　　　　講授內容
1　　Introduction & Fundamentals of Heat Transfer
2        Introduction to Heat Conduction & Steady-State
         Heat Conduction, I
3        Steady-State Heat Conduction, II
4　　Heat Conduction---Fins
5        Transient Heat Conduction
6　　Introduction to Convection
7        Mid-term, I & Convection---External flows, I
8　　Convection---External flows, II
9　　Convection---External flows, III
10       Convection---External flows, IV
11       Convection---External Flows, V
12　　Convection---Internal Flows, I
13　　Mid-term, II & Convection--- Internal Flows, II
14　　Convection---Natural Convection, I
15　　Convection---Natural Convection, II
16       Mixed Convection
17       Special Topic
18　　Final Exam
